attributes.action: Bring a complete ban & halt to ALL sale, manufacture & use of glue traps.
attributes.additional_details:
The Commission noted unanimous recognition that glue traps cause animal suffering, causing “significant & potentially prolonged animal suffering” to the target species.  

We demand the UK parliament take heed of the above findings & IMMEDIATELY effect the total ban on sales, importation, online sales, manufacture & all other methods of the sale & use of all forms of glue traps.
attributes.background: Given the The Scottish Animal Welfare Commission findings we call for the total ban on the sale, use, manufacture & importation of glue traps.  There should be no exceptions given in law (given the ability to bypass the law as in the loopholes legislated into the fox hunting ban)
